title: wtf why is this happening
body: i was playing and carrying as jinx yesterday and i clicked on this xin zhao to shoot him and i kept clicking him(right clicking) because its my habit and then i suddenly started moving towards him instead of shooting him and i died then my team lost the match. why did this happen? in the past when i keep right clicking i keep shooting them and not move towards them but yesterday this happened.

replies.body: happens to me 2, the attack markers are slightly off, I also realize it happens to enemies too, because they end up losing fights because they walked and didn't hit
It is possible you slightly missclicked the ground right next to him and moved towards that location, sometimes it can be hard to tell in teamfights where your clicking...
You likely missclicked and hit the ground next to him, so you walked up to the point on the ground you just clicked
do u even attack move bruh

did u press A then right click?
May've been the problem
